name: Switor
description:
Switor is easier way to change theme in your project.
It's now supporting local and global styles.

If you use local style in your project, just make new palette of theme and change it when you whant.

To use global styles, add all of themes in plugin and select what you want after in your project.

More information how its work find on youtube:

How to use global styles
https://youtu.be/9DiGDjLFknE

How to use local styles
https://youtu.be/EOnxfLtHccI

P.S. If you find a mistake or have a good idea how to make plugin better feel free to text me on facebook.
